official_title: A bill to extend and modify the "Net Worth Certificate Act" (12 U.S.C. 1811).

summary.text: Amends the Garn-St Germain Depository Institutions Act of 1982 to extend by three years the expiration date of the Net Worth Certificate Act.

titles.title: A bill to extend and modify the "Net Worth Certificate Act" (12 U.S.C. 1811).
